data.meta_description: Discover Berestia for you - information about the village, location, history, traditions, gastronomic specialities, tips what to see and where to go in Berestia.
data.text:
Village Berestia is located on the territory of Rivne region and is administratively part of Sarny district of this region. According to the Codifier of Administrative Territorial Units and Territories of Territorial Communities of Ukraine, the settlement Berestia has the code UA56080070040059216.

The district center of Sarny of the district is a city Sarny. The distance from the district center to the settlement Berestia is 22 kilometers in a straight line (the length of the road route may be longer).

A detailed description of Berestia, including geographical location, date of foundation, history of the settlement of Berestia with main historical events and persons, main sights and interesting places of Berestia, not yet available.
